Text: Demand Ken Lay Donate Proceeds from Enron Stock SalesChris Coen th Ave S Minneapolis MN To Mr Kenneth Lay I write to request that you donate the millions of dollars you made from selling Enron stock to the Enron Employee Transition Fund Enrons employees are now financially devastated while you made million in profit No we dont beleive the statements your wife made on national television about you not having any money Sincerely Chris Coen
